title: Running a Fine Dining Restaurant in a Recession
excerpt: How Eleven Madison Park survived the 2008 Global Recession ... and what this tells us about operating through the capital cycle.

title: Welcome to Hillstone, America's Favorite Restaurant | Bon Appétit
excerpt: It’s never going to win a James Beard Award. Or try to wow you with its foam experiments or ingredients you’ve never heard of. But it is the best-run, most-loved, relentlessly respected restaurant in America. And, oh yeah, Danny Meyer, David Chang, and Shaq all agree. Welcome to Hillstone.
